name: Enigma Robes
tooltip:
Enigma RobesLevel 60

Bring the Husk of the Old God, 2 Idols of the Sun, 5 Gold Scarabs and 5 Clay Scarabs to Vethsera inside Ahn'Qiraj.  You must also attain Honored reputation with the Brood of Nozdormu to complete this quest.

Requirements:
- Husk of the Old God
- Idol of the Sun x 2
- Gold Scarab x 5
- Clay Scarab x 5
- Brood of Nozdormu:
